alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:56AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clay, northern Nuckolls and east central Adams Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 756 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glenvil, or 12 miles southeast of Hastings, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairfield around 810 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Deweese, Edgar, Nelson and Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
